Package org.opensextant.data.social Description

Social Media Representation

Experimental. This simple data model of Tweet and Message posts is for the purposes of demonstrating how to tease apart geographic cues in social media: user self-descriptions, mentioned locations, profile locations, device and app locations, and indirect references to locations (addresses, acronyms, nicknames, etc.). The data ingest and processing is in the org.opensextant.extractors.geo.social
